**Tender Announcement for Snow, Ice, and Lawn Maintenance Services**
===========================================================

**Contract Reference Number**: WS4434099331
**Contract Title**: Snow, Ice, and Lawn Maintenance Services at the Newcastle Armoury

**Publication Date**: February 9, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: March 21, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2024

**Scope of Work**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is seeking a Service Contract provider to deliver Snow and Ice Control (SNIC) and Grass Cutting/Landscape Maintenance services at the Newcastle Armoury in Miramichi, New Brunswick.

The selected vendor will be required to provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, and equipment to maintain the Armoury's grounds, including snow and ice removal, lawn mowing, and landscape maintenance. The contract will have an initial term of one year, with two optional one-year extensions.

**Contract Specifications**:

* **UNSPSC Code**: 72102903 (Snow removal services)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Contact Information**:

* **Contracting Officer**: Chantal Blanchard, Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Email**: [chantal.blanchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.blanchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18759321 ](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18759321)

**Important Details**:

* Vendors are strongly encouraged to review the tender documents carefully to ensure they meet the eligibility criteria and requirements.
* The tender closing date is firm, and late submissions will not be accepted.
* The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted, and the selected vendor will be required to provide a comprehensive proposal outlining their services, pricing, and methodology.

Please visit the [Government of Canada's Bid Opportunities website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/contract-awards/index-e.aspx) for more information on this tender opportunity. You can also contact the Contracting Officer directly for any questions or inquiries.
